title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete models via simple async/sync client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now Open WebUI): markdown, code highlight, model manager, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with readline history, syntax highlighting, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop chat GUI for Ollama with conversation export and Markdown rendering.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering sync/async APIs, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints with ActiveModel-style interface.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerised with one command.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with async streaming, conversation state, and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Community Camunda Connectors that invoke Ollama models inside BPMN processes for AI tasks.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to integrate Ollama models into no-code workflows (chat, generate, embeddings).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI to chat over your docs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into channels with slash commands and moderation hooks.

title: ollama-mistral-vs-llama2 Reddit benchmark
summary: Community benchmark thread comparing Mistral-7B and Llama-2-7B latency/quality when served via Ollama.
